activities:
Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP is an international law firm, with clients located throughout the world and with offices in the U.S. and the EU. 

Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP utilises personal information for business development purposes, to provide legal services to clients, and to manage its own human resources functions. 

Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP routinely shares information between offices to facilitate and centralise the operation of client services, conflicts checking, records management, billing, marketing, information technology and related professional services.
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, including online, offline, and manually processed data
recoursemech:
Pursuant to our privacy policy, Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP will attempt to resolve any complaints and disputes regarding the use and disclosure of personal data in accordance with the provisions of its Safe Harbor Policy. 

Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to the safe harbour principles.
